situation.title: Visas
situation.meta_description: Visa services can only be fully renewed at the embassies of the so-called "green states", i.e. those with a low risk of contracting COVID-19.

content.processed:
Visa services and contacts

Visa services can only be fully renewed at the embassies of the so-called "green states", i.e. those with a low risk of contracting COVID-19. Ministry of the Interior keeps the list of countries updated.

With effect from October 22nd, it is not possible to travel to the Czech Republic for the purpose of tourism and visiting friends. Visa applications cannot be submitted for this purpose either.

Open consulates, the range of visa services, and other related information can be found on the website of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Czech Republic.

You can find an overview of who currently may or may not visit the Czech Republic on the website of the Ministry of the Interior.

You can also contact the Visa Department of the Ministry of the Interior of the Czech Republic by e-mail: vo@mzv.cz.

related_situations.title: Possibilities and obligations of foreigners when entering the Czech Republic
